ygData.subject: Personal Heater
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I know that the tinkering community has pretty deap pockets since most of us have spent a few thousand plat getting our skill up.  So my question is
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I know that the tinkering community has pretty deap pockets since most of us have spent a few thousand plat getting our skill up. So my question is simple: As I see it there have been two or three recipies proposed, none of these involving rare components like Diamond Dust, why hasn't anyone tried these? I don't have my tables of tinlering stuff with me right now but I know it couldn't cost more than 500pp to try all these recipies out, in fact it should cost much less.

Yattalren, Level 30 Wizard of the Rathe
